Implement the stateless game API for the image-only MVP:

- POST /api/v1/game/guess: verify token, compare guess against

Stack: Python + FastAPI + SQLAlchemy + SQLite

- Project documentation \(Claude.md, PRD.md, TechSpec.md, Status.md\)
